title: Barkway
description: Findspot of the Barkway Hoard, discovered ca. 1743 containing a bronze figure of Mars and a bronze knife or mace handle, and seven silver plates, three of which were inscribed with votive dedications (RIB 218, 219, and 220).

properties.description: Approximate location of findspot, described as a chalk pit dug in Rokey Wood, Barkway.
properties.title: Findspot (approx)
